>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/users/monthly-balance/{year}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get user's monthly balance breakdown for a specific year

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"year","required":true,"in":"path","description":"Year for which to get statistics","schema":{"example":2024,"type":"number"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Monthly balance breakdown","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"month":{"type":"number","description":"Month number (1-12)","example":1},"inflow":{"type":"string","description":"Total inflows for the month","example":"1000.00"},"expense":{"type":"string","description":"Total expenses for the month","example":"800.00"},"balance":{"type":"string","description":"Balance for the month","example":"200.00"}},"required":["month","inflow","expense","balance"],"title":"MonthlyBalanceDto"}}}}},"401":{"description":"User is not authorized to view these statistics"},"404":{"description":"User not found"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
